text: Ussey kaha gaya ke mahal mein daakhil ho, usne jo dekha to samjhi ke pani ka hauz hai aur utarne ke liye usne apne painchey utha liye (tucked up her skirt) , Sulaiman ne kaha yeh sheeshey (glass) ka chikna farsh hai ispar woh pukar utthi “Aey mere Rubb, (aaj tak) main apne nafs par bada zulm karti rahi, aur ab maine Sulaiman ke saath Allah Rabbul aalameen ki itaat qabool karli”
